Ability.Name: Heroic Leap
Ability.Lua:
local _,HLeap = GetSpellCooldown("Heroic Leap")
if HLeap == 0 and IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus()==nil then CastSpellByName("Heroic Leap") if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: ---- AoE ----
Ability.Lua:
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftShiftKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 0.3 then leftkeydown = GetTime() if AoEMode then AoEMode = false print("Rotation mode: \124c98FB982ASingle Target") else AoEMode = true print("Rotation mode: \124cFFF0002AArea of Effect") end end

Ability.Name: AoErot
Ability.Lua:
cast=CastSpellByName function check(sp,unit) unit = unit or "target"; spell = string.format("%s",sp) if GetSpellCooldown(spell)==0 and IsUsableSpell(spell) then if SpellHasRange(spell)==1 then if IsSpellInRange(spell,unit)~=1 then return false end end else return false end return true end
if AoEMode then if check("Whirlwind") then cast("Whirlwind") return end if check("Inner Rage") then cast("Inner Rage") return end if check("Cleave") then cast("Cleave") return end end

Ability.Name: Heroic Strike
Ability.Lua:
local csDebuff = UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "PLAYER") local csDebuffR = UnitDebuffID("target", 108126, "PLAYER") local rage = UnitPower("player") local IR = UnitBuffID("player", 1134) local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local incite = UnitBuffID("player", 50687) local cs, csx = GetSpellCooldown(86346) local cscd = (cs + csx - GetTime())
if (cscd > 5 or csx == 0) and (rage >= 85 or (IR ~= nil and rage >= 75)) and unithealth >= 20 then return true end

Ability.Name: Execute One
Ability.Lua:
local ExecuteTime, _, _, _, _, _, ExecuteExpireTime = UnitBuffID("player", 90806)
if ExecuteTime ~= nil then ExecuteTime = ExecuteExpireTime - GetTime() if ExecuteTime <= 2 then return true end else return false end

Ability.Name: Execute Two
Ability.Lua:
local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local _, _, _, count = UnitBuffID("player", 90806) local rage = UnitPower("player")
if unithealth < 20 then if count ~= 5 and rage >= 30 then return true end end

Ability.Name: Bloodthirst
Ability.Lua:
local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if unithealth > 20 then return true end

Ability.Name: Colossus Smash One
Ability.Lua:
local csDebuff = UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "PLAYER") local csDebuffR = UnitDebuffID("target", 108126, "PLAYER") local bt, btx = GetSpellCooldown(23881) local btcd = (bt + btx - GetTime()) local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if csDebuff == nil and csDebuffR == nil and btcd >= 1 and unithealth > 22 then return true end

Ability.Name: Inner Rage
Ability.Lua:
local csDebuff = UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "PLAYER") local csDebuffR = UnitDebuffID("target", 108126, "PLAYER") local rage = UnitPower("player") local IR = UnitBuffID("player", 1134) local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local incite = UnitBuffID("player", 50687)
if ((rage >= 75 and unithealth >= 20) or ((incite ~= nil or (csDebuff ~= nil or csDebuffR ~= nil)) and ((rage >= 40 and unithealth >= 20) or (rage >= 65 and unithealth <20)))) then
return true end

Ability.Name: Slam
Ability.Lua:
local BS = UnitBuffID("player", 46915) local bt, btx = GetSpellCooldown(23881) local btcd = (bt + btx - GetTime()) local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local DW = UnitBuffID("player", 12292) local EN = UnitBuffID("player", 13046) local UF = UnitBuffID("player", 49016) local BR = UnitBuffID("player", 18499) local rb, rbx = GetSpellCooldown(85288) local rbcd = (rb + rbx - GetTime())
if BS ~= nil and btcd >= 1 and unithealth > 20 and ((DW == nil and EN == nil and UF == nil or BR == nil) or rbcd >=1) then return true end

Ability.Name: Execute Three
Ability.Lua:
local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local rage = UnitPower("player")
if unithealth < 20 and rage >= 50 then return true end

Ability.Name: Heroic Strike Two
Ability.Lua:
local csDebuff = UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "PLAYER") local csDebuffR = UnitDebuffID("target", 108126, "PLAYER") local rage = UnitPower("player") local IR = UnitBuffID("player", 1134) local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local incite = UnitBuffID("player", 50687) local BT = UnitBuffID("player", 85742)
if BT ~= nil and unithealth > 20 then return true end

Ability.Name: Heroic Strike Three
Ability.Lua:
local csDebuff = UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "PLAYER") local csDebuffR = UnitDebuffID("target", 108126, "PLAYER") local rage = UnitPower("player") local IR = UnitBuffID("player", 1134) local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local incite = UnitBuffID("player", 50687) local cs, csx = GetSpellCooldown(86346) local cscd = (cs + csx - GetTime())
if (cscd > 5 or csx == 0) and unithealth > 20 and (incite ~= nil or (csDebuff ~= nil or csDebuffR ~= nil)) and (((rage >= 50 or (rage >= 40 and IR ~= nil)) and unithealth >= 20) or ((rage >= 75 or (rage >= 65 and IR ~= nil)) and unithealth <20)) then return true end

Ability.Name: Raging Blow
Ability.Lua:
local bt, btx = GetSpellCooldown(23881) local btcd = (bt + btx - GetTime()) local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if btcd >= 1 and unithealth > 20 then return true end

Ability.Name: Heroic Strike Four
Ability.Lua:
local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local rage = UnitPower("player") local IR = UnitBuffID("player", 1134) local BT = UnitBuffID("player", 85742)
if rage >= 85 and unithealth > 20 then return true end

Ability.Name: Raging Blow Two
Ability.Lua:
local IR = UnitBuffID("player", 1134) local rage = UnitPower("player") local ir, irx = GetSpellCooldown(1134) local ircd = (ir + irx - GetTime()) local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if rage > 90 and IR ~= nil and unithealth > 20 then return true end

Ability.Name: Battle Shout two
Ability.Lua:
local bt, btx = GetSpellCooldown(23881) local btcd = (bt + btx - GetTime()) local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if UnitPower("player") < 70 and btcd >= 1 and unithealth > 20 then return true end

Ability.Name: Battle Shout
Ability.Lua:
local BS = UnitBuff("player", "6673") local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if BS == nil and unithealth > 20 then return true end

Ability.Name: Berserker Rage
Ability.Lua:
local rage = UnitPower("player") local retal, retalX = GetSpellCooldown(20230) local DW = UnitBuffID("player", 12292) local EN = UnitBuffID("player", 13046) local UF = UnitBuffID("player", 49016) local BR = UnitBuffID("player", 18499) local rb, rbx = GetSpellCooldown(85288) local rbcd = (rb + rbx - GetTime())
if (DW == nil and EN == nil and UF == nil) and rage > 15 and rbcd < 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: --- cooldowns ---
Ability.Lua: if IsRightAltKeyDown() then return true end

Ability.Name: Trinket 2
Ability.Lua:
local csDebuff = UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "PLAYER") local csDebuffR = UnitDebuffID("target", 108126, "PLAYER")
if GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",14) == 0 and (csDebuff ~= nil or csDebuffR ~= nil) then UseInventoryItem(14) end

Ability.Name: --- Adv Exec ---
Ability.Lua:
local cs, csx = GetSpellCooldown(86346) local cscd = (cs + csx - GetTime()) local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local slam = UnitBuffID("player", 46916) local rage = UnitPower("player") local applejack = _G["applejack"]; local cs, csx = GetSpellCooldown(86346) local cscd = (cs + csx - GetTime()) local BT = UnitBuffID("player", 85742) local exec = UnitBuffID("player", 90806) local csDebuff = UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "PLAYER") local csDebuffR = UnitDebuffID("target", 108126, "PLAYER") local CSTime, _, _, _, _, _, CSExpireTime = UnitDebuffID("target", 108126, "PLAYER") local DW = UnitBuffID("player", 12292) local EN = UnitBuffID("player", 13046) local UF = UnitBuffID("player", 49016) local BR = UnitBuffID("player", 18499) local enrage = 0 local global_cats2 = _G["cats2"]; local var = _G["cats2"]; local rainbowcheck = _G["rainbowdash"];
-- cs debuff duration if csDebuffR ~= nil then csdur = CSExpireTime - GetTime() end
-- no idea if applejack == 535 then if cscd <= 8 or cscd == 0 then csready = 1 end end
-- heroic strike if rage >= 85 or BT ~= nil and (cscd >= 3 or csx == 0) then CastSpellByName("Heroic Strike") CastSpellByName("Inner Rage") end
-- Switch to CS execute phase if it's up early if exec ~= nil and rage >= 55 and csx == 0 then var = 4 end
--Switch to execute spam if CS 4pc is up if csDebuffR ~= nil and rage > 40 and unithealth < 20 and csdur >= 5.6 then _G["cats2"] = 5;
elseif csDebuffR ~= nil and rage > 30 and unithealth < 20 and csdur <= 5.2 and csdur >= 4.8 then _G["cats2"] = 6;
elseif csDebuffR ~= nil and rage > 20 and unithealth < 20 and csdur <= 4.5 and csdur >= 3 then _G["cats2"] = 6;
elseif csDebuffR ~= nil and rage > 20 and unithealth < 20 and csdur <= 3 and csdur >= 2.5 then _G["cats2"] = 7; end
-- Fading Light local FL = {105925, 109075, 110068, 110069, 110070, 110078, 110079, 110080}
for i,v in ipairs(FL) do local _,_,_,_,_,_,flight = UnitDebuffID("player", v) if flight and flight - GetTime() < 2 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end end
-- Hour of Twilight local HoTcast,_,_,_,_,endtime = UnitCastingInfo("boss1") local HoT = {109415, 106371, 109416, 109415, 109417}
for i,v in ipairs(HoT) do if HoTcast == GetSpellInfo(v) and endtime/1000 - GetTime() < .5 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end end
-- Madness local _,_,_,_,_,_,shrapnel = UnitDebuff("player","Shrapnel")
if shrapnel and shrapnel - GetTime() < .75 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end
if 535 == global_cats2 or global_cats2 < 15 then -- do nothing else _G["cats2"] = 535; _G["rainbowdash"] = 535; end
if unithealth <= 20 then
if var == 535 and GetSpellCooldown("Bloodthirst") == 0 and IsUsableSpell("Bloodthirst") == 1 then CastSpellByName("Bloodthirst") _G["cats2"] = 1; end
if var == 1 and GetSpellCooldown("Execute") == 0 and IsUsableSpell("Execute") == 1 then CastSpellByName("Execute") _G["cats2"] = 2; end
if var == 2 and GetSpellCooldown("Bloodthirst") == 0 and IsUsableSpell("Bloodthirst") == 1 then CastSpellByName("Bloodthirst") _G["cats2"] = 3; _G["rainbowdash"] = 466; -- 466 means rd is ready to cast end
-- if _G["rainbowdash"] == 466 then -- 466 is up, we need to filler now. if rainbowcheck == 466 then -- 466 is up, we need to filler now. if DW ~= nil or EN ~= nil or UF ~= nil or BR ~= nil then enraged = 1 else enraged = 0 end
-- if rage <=50 and _G["rainbowdash"] == 466 and GetSpellCooldown("Battle Shout") then if rage <=50 and rainbowcheck == 466 and GetSpellCooldown("Battle Shout") == 0 then CastSpellByName("Battle Shout") _G["rainbowdash"] = 1; end
-- if slam ~= nil and _G["rainbowdash"] == 466 and GetSpellCooldown("Slam") then if slam ~= nil and rainbowcheck == 466 and GetSpellCooldown("Slam") == 0 and IsUsableSpell("Slam") == 1 then CastSpellByName("Slam") _G["rainbowdash"] = 1; end
-- if rage >50 and _G["rainbowdash"] == 466 and enraged == 1 and GetSpellCooldown("Raging Blow")then if rage >50 and rainbowcheck == 466 and enraged == 1 and GetSpellCooldown("Raging Blow") == 0 and IsUsableSpell("Raging Blow") == 1 then CastSpellByName("Raging Blow") _G["rainbowdash"] = 1; end
end
-- if _G["rainbowdash"] == 466 then if rainbowcheck == 466 then print("something went wrong or we are waiting to cast a filler") if GetSpellCooldown("Bloodthirst") == 0 and IsUsableSpell("Bloodthirst") == 1 then CastSpellByName("Bloodthirst") _G["cats2"] = 4; _G["rainbowdash"] = 1; end end
if var == 3 and GetSpellCooldown("Bloodthirst") == 0 and IsUsableSpell("Bloodthirst") == 1 and _G["rainbowdash"] == 1 then -- rd becomes 1 after we've done a filler. CastSpellByName("Bloodthirst") _G["cats2"] = 4;
end
if var == 4 and GetSpellCooldown("Colossus Smash") == 0 and IsUsableSpell("Colossus Smash") == 1 then CastSpellByName("Colossus Smash") _G["cats2"] = 5; elseif cscd >= 2 and var == 4 then _G["cats2"] = 11; end
if var == 5 and GetSpellCooldown("Execute") == 0 and IsUsableSpell("Execute") == 1 then CastSpellByName("Execute") _G["cats2"] = 6; end
if var == 6 and GetSpellCooldown("Execute") == 0 and IsUsableSpell("Execute") == 1 then CastSpellByName("Execute") _G["cats2"] = 7; end
if var == 7 and GetSpellCooldown("Execute") == 0 and IsUsableSpell("Execute") == 1 then CastSpellByName("Execute") _G["cats2"] = 8; end if var == 8 and GetSpellCooldown("Execute") == 0 and IsUsableSpell("Execute") == 1 then CastSpellByName("Execute") _G["cats2"] = 9; end
if var == 9 and GetSpellCooldown("Bloodthirst") == 0 and IsUsableSpell("Execute") == 1 then CastSpellByName("Bloodthirst") _G["cats2"] = 10; _G["rainbowdash"] = 466; end
if var == 10 and GetSpellCooldown("Bloodthirst") == 0 and IsUsableSpell("Bloodthirst") == 1 and _G["rainbowdash"] == 1 then -- rd becomes 1 after we've done a filler. CastSpellByName("Bloodthirst") _G["cats2"] = 11; end
if var == 11 and GetSpellCooldown("Execute") == 0 and IsUsableSpell("Execute") == 1 then CastSpellByName("Execute") _G["cats2"] = 12; end
if var == 12 then _G["cats2"] = 535; _G["rainbowdash"] = 535; end
end
if unithealth > 20 then _G["cats2"] = 535; _G["rainbowdash"] = 535; end
if unithealth == 0 then _G["cats2"] = 535; _G["rainbowdash"] = 535; end

Ability.Name: --Raging Blow
Ability.Lua:
local bt, btx = GetSpellCooldown(23881) local btcd = (bt + btx - GetTime()) local var = _G["cats2"];
if var == 3 and btcd >= 1 then _G["cats2"] = 4; return true end

Ability.Name: --Slam
Ability.Lua:
local BS = UnitBuffID("player", 46915) local bt, btx = GetSpellCooldown(23881) local btcd = (bt + btx - GetTime()) local var = _G["cats2"];
if var == 3 and BS ~= nil and btcd >= 1 then _G["cats2"] = 4; return true end

Ability.Name: --Battle Shout two
Ability.Lua:
local bt, btx = GetSpellCooldown(23881) local btcd = (bt + btx - GetTime()) local var = _G["cats2"];
if var == 3 and GetSpellCooldown("Battle Shout") == 0 and UnitPower("player") < 70 and btcd >= 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: --- reset ---
